description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A 2D Space Shooter that focuses on hardcore multiplayer action! Play the 8 original game types including the fast paced Survivor and the mind provoking Numb3rs! Find different Weapons and Power-Ups to gain advantages over your opponents. Enjoy different visual effects in game including the HIGHLY appealing Retro Mode!
